name: Stack (itch) (Glaas)
description:
IF THE WEBGL BUILD DOES NOT WORK, YOU CAN DOWNLOAD THE STANDALONE VERSION

Hiya !


Welcome to Stack !

Every crate is worth points. But the higher a crate is, the more points you get for it.

Show me your building skills by making a cool structure, and share your score in the comments !

Careful; it's not exactly... stable

Please consider rating this entry ! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/stack

This is a compo entry; all code, assets, models, sounds, music were created from scratch during the jam, and I worked in solo.
